/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with towering buildings, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the urban landscape below. The sun casts long shadows, adding depth and dimension to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
